cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 13th Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 13th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Private room with King size bed, ensuite bathroom, Freeview TV, fridge, Tea/Coffee facilities, heating & aircon.*Please note these rooms are internal and have a small window with no balcony.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Private room with King size bed, ensuite bathroom, Freeview TV, fridge, Tea/Coffee facilities, heating & aircon. *Please note - adjacent to Searle Lane, a vibrant laneway of bars and restaurants and does experience increased noise from the street below*

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

privates.name: Deluxe Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Private room with King size bed, ensuite bathroom, Freeview TV, fridge, Tea/Coffee facilities, shared balcony, heating & aircon & views of Queenstown Gondola. Please note there can be noise from the below vibrant laneway of bars and restaurants.
